resources.string: Show All (Warning, can be very slow!)
Author: John Hudson\nQuestions, comments, suggestions? Send emails to johhud1@gmail.com

Welcome to PassiveLocationTracker. This is the map view, where location \ requests are marked by their geographic position. Each location request is placed on the map as its own marker, unless there were several requests nearby in a small time-frame, in which case the requests are merged into one marker, and the number of merged \ requests is noted in the marker callout
This is the time graph view. The number of requests per hour is graphed here. You can select \ a time range to show in the map view by clicking on graph.
